remarks: A subring of a unital algebra is a subspace and thus a subalgebra iff it contains all scalar multiples of the identity.  (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 9-Mar-2015.)
statement:
issubassa2.a $e |- A = ( algSc ` W ) $.
issubassa2.l $e |- L = ( LSubSp ` W ) $.
issubassa2 $p |- ( ( W e. AssAlg /\ S e. ( SubRing ` W ) ) -> ( S e. L <-> ran A C_ S ) ) $.
